alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Harlan; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 25 at 6:34PM CST until December 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Pockets of lingering snow expected. Additional snow accumulations mainly between 2 and 4 inches, most of which will fall through tonight. Northwest winds gusting 25 to 35 MPH this evening, but decreasing to no more than 20 to 30 MPH most areas late tonight through Wednesday. * WHERE...Franklin, Harlan, and Webster Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions for post-Christmas travel. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibilities to below 1/2 mile. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
